game_engine

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_engine.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main controller to manage all the UI view components.
    Author:
    Tee Chee Guan, 18202044, Katarina Cvetkovic, 18347921, Rajit Banerjee, 18202817 Team 15: DarkMode
